connector.description: Upload data to an IBM Cloud Object Storage Bucket.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.apiKey.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.apiKey
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.apiKey.description: IBM Cloud API Key for authentication.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.location.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.location
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.location.description: IBM COS Location/Region (e.g., us-south, eu-gb). Example: us-south

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.autoCreateBuc.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.autoCreateBucket
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.autoCreateBuc.description: Specifies to automatically create the IBM COS bucket.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.keyName.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.keyName
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.keyName.description: The key name for saving an element in the bucket.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.multiPartUplo.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.multiPartUpload
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.multiPartUplo.description: Use multi-part upload for large files.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.storageClass.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.storageClass
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-sink.storageClass.description: The storage class to use when storing objects (e.g., STANDARD, VAULT, COLD, FLEX).
